name: ECTU - European Shippers' Council
goal: Representing the interests of cargo owners and transport users/shippers in logistics and transportation.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Inland transport: Mobility Package;Maritime: Block Exemption Regulation; ail: noise issue and TEN-T; Aviation: slot allocation at airports, a level playing field for carriers; Inland waterways;Brexit
